name: Killer Escape 4
description:
A 3D First Person Escape Game SUGGEST 13+ AS THIS GAME CONTAINS SCARY ELEMENTS, CG BLOOD AND ADULT THEMES -  YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!

WASD = Move, SPACE  = Jump, ESC = Quit

A decent Gaming PC is recommended! Check out Being One 6 DEMO - https://psionicgames.itch.io/being-one-episode-6-beta-test  if that runs OK then so should this ;-)

Killer Escape 4 continues  the series but also starts something new . There's about 30 mins gameplay if you figure it all out quickly and don't find look for any of the 10 crystals or read any of the 10 notes - There's also a couple of Awards for completing it quickly etc that unlock a little more info about what's going on.

An FPEG - A First Person Escape Game - cool eh? It's essentially a Point & Click FPS game with the primary goal of escaping. (So expect a little reading ;-))                                                                                                                                                                                  

Again all your support is totally appreciated & NEEDED. This is make or break for me! If this and Being One 6 Fail then that's me done in Indie Game Dev after 10+ years and 40+ FREE Games created ;-0

                                                                                                                                                                                 

  • 2018 - Being One Episode 6  OUT NOW
    https://psionicgames.itch.io/being-one-episode-6
  • 30 Nov 2017 - Also available on Android @ Google play store (downgraded GFX) - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PsionicGames.KillerEscape4&hl=...
  • VERSION 1.1 - 31 Oct 2017 - Little update,Fixed a few minor bugs - Added some doors with creepy sounds behind them - Added recent file on final computer for some extra information.
  • VERSION 1.0 - 28 Oct 2017 - First build - a few more things will be added over the next few days as well - please report bugs etc below.

                                                                                                                                                                        

REALLY STUCK? Here's a MAP and stuff - http://www.psionicgames.com/ke4.html
